DataElement.preferredName: Imaging Technique Study Protocol Requirement Fulfill Indicator

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3788215 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were pre-operative brain MRIs, with and without gadolinium, performed within 14 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were pre-operative brain MRIs, with and without gadolinium, performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were pre-operative brain MRIs performed per protocol specifications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were post-operative brain MRIs, with and without gadolinium, performed within 72 hours of surgery and within 14 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were post-operative brain MRIs, with and without gadolinium, performed within 72 hours of surgery?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were post-operative brain MRIâ€™s performed per protocol specifications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were spine MRIs, with gadolinium, performed within 14 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were spine MRIs, with gadolinium, performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were spine MRIs, with and without gadolinium, performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were spine MRIs performed per protocol specifications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were initial brain MRIs performed at the time of diagnosis or prior to surgery?
